General.Name: Qingyan Environmental Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Qingyan Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. develops environmental protection equipment. It offers rapid purification of sewage using sedimentation integrated rectangular airlift loop reactors; and ammonia and other environmental pollutants, and microbial control agents. The company was founded 2014 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Research Inst. of Tsinghua Univ, Shenzhen, China
